name: Rear Delt Raise
how_to_perform:
1. Stand with your back to a bench, with your feet shoulder-width apart. Extend arms straight out to the sides at shoulder height.
 
2. Keeping arms straight, lift them up and out to the rear (back) until they are in line with your head.

3. Slowly lower your arms back down to the starting position and repeat for the desired number of repetitions.
short_summary: Rear delt raises target the rear deltoids as a primary muscle group, working this area through arm movements.
